revised_title: Advancements in Achromatic Eye-Pieces: A Solution to the Limitations of Huyghenian Eye-Pieces
tldr: The author, J.B. Reade, presents a solution to the limitations of Huyghenian eye-pieces in refracting telescopes by introducing single achromatic lenses. These lenses, made by combining a crown-lens and a flint-lens, eliminate internal reflections and improve the overall performance of the telescope.
